Parameter.description: (required) the podcast name
(optional) the link to listen to the podcast
(optional) the date the podcast was released
(optional) the podcast producer
(optional) the length of the podcast - this could be the total number of episodes, or the time length, you choose
(required) the description or summary of the podcast
(optional) the array of episodes associated with the podcast
(optional) short words or phrases to help find a podcast, such as category or content
(optional) a link to a picture to use for the podcast

Success 200.description: the podcast's unique ID
the podcast name
the link to listen to the podcast
the date the podcast was released
the podcast producer
the length of the podcast - this could be the total number of episodes, or the time length, you choose
the description or summary of the podcast
the array of episodes associated with the podcast
short words or phrases to help find a podcast, such as category or content
a link to a picture to use for the podcast

permission.name: must be logged in, review must be their own

title: Get all the reviews for a specific podcast
name: getForPodcast

Success 200.description: array of reviews written for specified podcast

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[{
    "_id": "012345678912",
    "name": "It was... ok",
    "podcast": '012345678918',
    "episode": 'null',
    "rating": 3,
    "review": "I thought it would be better, but it was ok. Not thrilling by any means.",
    "spoilers": "false"
    "reviewer": {
       _id: "012345678924",
       name: "Tyler Estes"
      }
  },
  {
    "_id": "012345678915",
    "name": "It was... awesome!!!",
    "podcast": '012345678918',
    "episode": 'null',
    "rating": 5,
    "review": "I thought it was just as thrilling as the description suggested!",
    "spoilers": "false"
    "reviewer": {
       _id: "012345678925",
       name: "Kelleigh Maroney"
      }
}]

Parameter.description: (required) ID of podcast the review is for
(required) the name or title for the review
(optional) the episode of the podcast the review is for - if null, refers to the podcast as a whole, not a specific episode
(required) the score given to the review - you must decide and control the min/max scores allowed
(required) the text of the review
(required) flag for whether the review will contain spoilers or not

Success 200.description: the review's unique ID
the name or title for the review
ID of podcast the review is for
the episode of the podcast the review is for - if null, refers to the podcast as a whole, not a specific episode
the score given to the review - you must decide and control the min/max scores allowed
the text of the review
flag for whether the review will contain spoilers or not
the ID and name of the writer of the review

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:

[{
    "_id": "012345678912",
    "name": "It was... ok",
    "podcast": '012345678918',
    "episode": 'null',
    "rating": 3,
    "review": "I thought it would be better, but it was ok. Not thrilling by any means.",
    "spoilers": "false"
    "reviewer": {
       _id: "012345678924",
       name: "Tyler Estes"
      }
  }
